_comment: Village Buildings - Each turn: place worker (triggers action), then pick up worker (triggers same action again)

_structure_explanation.name: Building name
_structure_explanation.worker_slots: Number of workers that can be placed here
_structure_explanation.action: What happens when placing OR picking up a worker (same action both times)
_structure_explanation.worker_requirement: Which worker colors can use this building: null (any), or array like ['grey', 'white']

action.notes: Hand limit of 8 cards enforced at end of turn

action.description: Play 1 Hand Card and resolve its Town Hall action (shown at bottom right of card). Card goes to discard pile.
Discard 1 Hand Card to gain 2 Silver, OR discard 2 Hand Cards to gain 1 Gold
Hire a Crew Member from hand (pay Silver cost). Max 5 crew; may discard 1 crew before hiring.
Lose 1 Iron to gain 2 Armour, OR lose 2 Silver to gain 1 Armour
Black Worker: 1 Provision, Grey Worker: 2 Provisions, White Worker: 2 Provisions OR 1 Gold
Black Worker: 3 Silver, Grey Worker: 2 Silver, White Worker: 2 Silver

options.description: Pay Plunder/Silver shown on Offering Tile to gain it (scores VP at game end). New tile immediately revealed.

action.description: Choose: (1) Lose 1 Livestock for 2 Provisions, OR (2) Make an Offering
